name: Gasomaton
description:
Gas simulation using cellurar automata. It's like Game Of Life but physically accurate gas from cells/particles.

Use different tools to interact with the simulation. Increase speed or size of the field, but it will use more resources, mainly GPU.

Gasomaton uses WebGL 2.0, so only Google Chrome or Firefox.

Github project: https://github.com/radulov/LatticeGasWeb feel free to contribute. Also available as a standalone site: https://www.golova.dev/automata/latticeGas
